info.name: Dental Appointment API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Dental Appointment Management System.

âš ï¸ IMPORTANT: CSRF Protection is enabled.
Before making any POST, PATCH, DELETE requests:
1. First call 'Get CSRF Token' from Authentication folder
2. Copy the csrfToken from response
3. Add X-CSRF-Token header to your request with the value

Most POST/PATCH/DELETE requests already have X-CSRF-Token header configured.
You just need to get a token first and update the {{csrfToken}} variable.

ğŸ“… Appointment System:
- Users can book appointments for themselves or others
- Secretaries can approve/cancel appointments
- Automatic SMS notifications are sent at various stages
- Reminder SMS sent 24h and 30min before appointment
- Notification system for secretaries when new appointments are created
